Home DEPARTMENTS MUNICIPAL COURT Saint Hedwig Municipal Court Dee Grimm, RN, JD Cynthia Trevino Melissa Vick Pay Your Citation By Clicking Here For more information, Please call City Hall at 210-667-9568 or Email the Court Clerk at: Court@sainthedwigcity.com Court is held the third Wednesday of each month, at 1:00 P.M., unless otherwise noted. Docket *NEW FEATURE EFFECTIVE 10/27/2025* TEXT ALERTS FOR DELINQUENT CASES The Saint Hedwig Municipal Court accepts the following types of payment: Cash, Check , Money Orders , Cashier's Check , Credit/Debit Cards Make payable to the City of Saint Hedwig.  No personal checks will be accepted for cases in WARRANT STATUS. There is a processing fee on all credit and debit card transactions. You can pay your citation in the following ways: In Person:  Payments can be made at the window during normal business hours Online: https://govpay.net/saint-hedwig-tx-municipal-court Mail:      Saint Hedwig Municipal Court P.O. Box 40 Saint Hedwig, TX 78152 Saint Hedwig Municipal Court does not accept any cash in the mail TDLR Alcohol and Drug Courses Approved TDLR Driving Safety Course Tobacco Awareness Program State driving Record Texas Driver's License Information Texas Department of Motor Vehicles - Registration
